content.prompt: Consider a 90 percent confidence interval to estimate a population proportion that is constructed from a sample proportion of 66 percent. If the width of the interval is 10 percent, what is the margin of error?

topic.text: 6.3: Justifying a Claim Based on a Confidence Interval for a Population Proportion

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Make an appropriate claim or draw an appropriate conclusion.
